name: XWUI Brightness Component
description: Controls the brightness of components with a scroll-based slider control. Supports showing/hiding the controller and positioning it at different locations (up, down, middle, left, right). Uses XWUISlider internally for the brightness adjustment control.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

showController.description: Whether to show the brightness controller slider

targetSelector.description: CSS selector for elements to apply brightness to (default: applies to entire viewport)

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the brightness component

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component
